title: @riot still no star guardian icon
body: I did the quiz its been like 3-4 days or however long the skins been out and everyone else on my friends list is rocking the icon except me can I get some help here?

replies.body:
As long as you were logged into the site through your account and took the quiz, you'll be fine.  The icons won't come right away, and some players may get it sooner than others.  Looking into your specific case, it looks like you got yours last night.  :D  It personally took 3 days for mine!  Hang tight, the mark will come to all who shine their light towards the First Star!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I still haven't got mine after like a week and a 1/2

Can you verify that your account is processing the icon by retaking the quiz?  Once you complete the quiz, there should be a message to either claim it or that it's already redeemed.  Let me know what you find!
I don't have a message that says to claim it, what's wrong?
I still don't have my icon and it's been 6-7 days now, any chance it's still coming?

Thanks for the reply I really appreciate that you took the time to check my account
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=39qhisOq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-11T16:36:59.931+0000)
>
> As long as you were logged into the site through your account and took the quiz, you'll be fine.  The icons won't come right away, and some players may get it sooner than others.  Looking into your specific case, it looks like you got yours last night.  :D  It personally took 3 days for mine!  Hang tight, the mark will come to all who shine their light towards the First Star!
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I did the quiz twice a week+ and I still have not recieved any icon. I was signed in and everything. Can you help? Thanks!
lol wow you got a riot post I'm still missing mine. Took the quiz a few days ago as well still no luck.
You received your mark of the star guardian icon on the 14th!  Scroll down your summoner icon menu a bit if it's not showing at the top!
same for me... i did the quiz milion times and nothing , its more then week... is there any chance to get it ?
grats on your icon! still waiting on mine, been at least 3 days.
It looks like yours unlocked on the 13th!  You may need to scroll down your summoner icons menu to find it!
Did the quiz multiple times about a week ago, still haven't gotten anything :(
I did the quiz like a week ago. Still no icon... :(
It's been well over 3 days for me and I haven't gotten it...:(

I took the test the same day it was put up and has still not recieved my icon. I was logged in and after completing the test I got redirected to the "claim icon" page. I really wanted this icon and I've taken the test about 8 times + since then just to get my icon. RITO pls
